main: ^<sp:50>This text is going to be slower than the other one! <sp:100>This should be normal!
^<anim:wave>This should be shaking</anim> and this should not!
^Lastly, there should be some <anim:shake>shaky text</anim> to spice things up!
^Does that all make sense to you?
YES: ^Ok good, glad to know you're not an <anim:shake>idiot</anim>
NO: ^Well, I'm not expalining it again. <anim:wave>Get fucked nerd</anim>
Final: ^Ok, that's the tutorial! Thanks for watching! <anim:shake><sp:75>We'll be seeing you!</anim>
